page.title: 15HEALTH AND WELFARE
page.content: {HEALTH CARE} There is a doctors group practice in the survey area immediately South of this,on the edge of the Abbotswood Estate.Surgeries are held from 9.0 to 12.00 and 2.00 to 6.00 Monday to Friday,and from 8.00 to 10.30 on Saturdays for emergencies. There are 4 doctors available plus 1 trainee.The additional staff consists of 3 part- time nurses,4 part-time receptionists, 2 health visitors(shared with the Hucclecote surgery),2 district nurses and 2 midwives. {HORSEBERE HOUSE { }This is a home for elderly and infirm people and caters for 55 men and women from Brockworth and Gloucester areas.The oldest resident will be 101 in December 1985 and one lady of 91 has been in residence since the home was opened in 1964.
